artist: Artist: Utagawa Yoshitora; Publisher: Takekawa Seikichi
creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: framed, assembled triptych; long procession of horse drawn carriages with passengers in Western dress; procession is crossing a bridge at R and doubling back across image at L on green ground; densely packed audience looking on; Western style building at L; retaining wall in middle ground; train in far background pulling away from station
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
title: Tōkyō meisho Shinbashi no zu
